mapper.insert: insert into cart (userid, productcode, cartmount, color, c_size) values (#{userid}, #{productcode}, #{cartmount}, #{color}, #{c_size})
mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(cartdate, 'YYYYMMDD') as cartdate, userid, productcode, cartmount, color, c_size, productname, price from cart where userid = #{userid}
